title: Have you been diagnosed with a mood disorder
Which mood disorders have you been diagnosed with? Please select all that apply.
How many years ago were you first diagnosed with a mood disorder (to the best of your ability to recall)?
Are you currently receiving treatment for this disorder, if so, which types? Please select all treatments that you have received in the last month that are intended to treat your mood disorder(s).
answer: Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitor (MAOI), such as: Emsam (selegiline), Marplan (isocarboxaxid)

Have you been diagnosed with an anxiety disorder

answer: One-on-one talk therapy with a professional

title: In the past two weeks have you been bothered by symptoms of your anxiety disorder(s)?
Have you been diagnosed with attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) or attention-deficit disorder (ADD)?
Which attention disorders have you been diagnosed with? Please select all that apply.
How many years ago were you first diagnosed with an attention disorder (to the best of your ability to recall)?
Are you currently receiving treatment for this disorder, if so, which types? Please select all treatments that you have received in the last month that are intended to treat your anxiety disorder(s).
answer: Amphetamine, such as Dexedrine (dextroamphetamine), Adderall (amphetamine salts), Vyvanse (lisdexamfetamine)
